document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Dorset on the east coast.
document_data.name: Dorset
document_data.mainbody: '''Dorset''' was a small town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Dorset was found in southern Callidyrr in the county of [[Stirgewick]]. It sat within the southern tip of the island of Alaron which was known as [[Bregonshire]]. Dorset was a coastal town on the [[Sea of Swords]] just south of the [[Rushdown Wood]] on Alaron's eastern coast.
